**“Which course in the CS curriculum covers forwarding and routing concepts (including routing tables) after teaching TCP and before moving to MAC addressing?”**
**“Can you tell me if there’s a class that covers multiple‑access link protocols (e.g., CSMA/CD, CSMA/CA) along with the rest of the OSI layers as described?”**
